1604320.name: Daffy Fish
1604320.description:
Welcome to Daffy Fish, where you play as a happy flying fish that must make his way through a number of challenging levels, collecting goodies and avoiding dangers on the way to the finish line.

Designed in the old-school arcade style of play you can select from 3 modes from Easy, Medium and Hard to challenge yourself and friends to see who can make it the farthest and score the most points.

There are 20 challenging levels to enjoy that will take you through the Caribbean Islands, Pyramids of Egypt, The Icy Artic and Lava World.

Just remember as you play that water is life to Daffy Fish, so don’t stay out of the water too long.

(Steam Deck Compatible)

-Enjoy :-)
